description: NEW: A NEW DRUMSET WAS ADDED - ELECTRONIC DRUMS - Swipe on the gesture area to choose between the natural and the electronical drums!  Did you ever wish to play the drums whenever you want and wherever you are? But your drumset is just too big for your pocket? Here's the ultimate solution: NATURAL + ELECTRONIC DRUMS! Now you have the possibility to carry it all with you and enjoy playing a complete drumset with beautiful, rendered graphics, visual feedback and high fidelity sounds no matter where!
